title: Understanding Dog Age: Science Behind the Calculator
description: Learn how dog age conversion works, why the old '7-year rule' is outdated, and how breed size affects aging patterns in dogs

title: Dog Obesity Crisis: BMI and Weight Management Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to assessing your dog's weight, understanding canine BMI, and creating effective weight management plans

title: Life Stages of Dogs: From Puppy to Senior
description: Detailed breakdown of dog life stages, developmental milestones, and age-appropriate care for every phase of your dog's life

title: Breed-Specific Aging Patterns: Size Matters
description: Why small dogs live longer than large dogs, breed-specific health concerns, and how genetics influence aging in different dog breeds

title: Canine Health Assessment: Beyond Weight and Age
description: Complete guide to evaluating your dog's overall health, recognizing warning signs, and when to consult a veterinarian

title: Diet and Nutrition by Dog Age and Size
description: Age and size-specific nutrition requirements, feeding schedules, and dietary adjustments for optimal health throughout your dog's life
